text: This was a pretty good IoT research round up.

attachments.title: Roundup Of Internet Of Things Forecasts And Market Estimates, 2016
attachments.text: This years’ series of Internet of Things (IoT) and Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) forecasts reflect a growing focus on driving results using sensor-based data and creating analytically rich data sets. What emerges is a glimpse into where IoT and IIoT can deliver the most value, and that’s in solving complex logistics, manufacturing, services, and supply chain problems.
attachments.fallback: Forbes: Roundup Of Internet Of Things Forecasts And Market Estimates, 2016
